word: My anxiety is to do the work the Master has given me to do and let nothing divert me from this work. . . . We must seek to be one with God. His interest must be our interest, His sentiments and designs ours. We know the love of God for sinners and the infinite sacrifice that has been made to save perishing souls; then let us unite with Christ in this great work.--Letter 82, April 18, 1887, to Edson and Emma White.
